## SearchConfig type

The main configuration options for [AnswersCore](./answers-core.answerscore.md)<!-- -->. For a full description of the options, see [BaseSearchConfig](./answers-core.basesearchconfig.md)<!-- -->. The config requires either an apiKey or a token.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type SearchConfig = SearchConfigWithApiKey | SearchConfigWithToken;
```
<b>References:</b> [SearchConfigWithApiKey](./answers-core.searchconfigwithapikey.md)<!-- -->, [SearchConfigWithToken](./answers-core.searchconfigwithtoken.md)
